titles: An answer to a letter of a Iesuit named Tyrie, be Iohne Knox
Answer to a letter of a Jesuit named Tyrie.
author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.
notes: Contains a letter written to his mother-in-law, Elizabeth Bowes, in 1554.
Reprinted and answered in: Tyrie, James.  The refutation of ane ansuer made be schir Johne Knox.  STC 24476.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Tyrie, James, 1543-1597. --  Refutation of ane ansuer made be schir Johne Knox.
